input.sentences: at the party everyone had brought their guitars .
they played all the songs that they knew .
the family sat and listened to the play .
then everyone sat and shared stories with each other .
after that the kids sat to play video games .
output.sentences: At the family gathering several guests played the guitar.
Jim joined in and they played several popular songs.
The kids and wives of the men playing sat closeby and listened.
They enjoyed listening to the music with each other.
The only exception being James, he sat alone and stared at a TV screen all night.
